>

</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 104 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cape

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black cape flows more like a vaporous liquid than fabric. The cape grants you a +3 item bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks. When you invest the cape, you either increase your Dexterity score by 2 or increase it to 18, whichever is higher.
